formal_templates.welcome: Good day, and welcome to the Cambridge restaurant reservation system. I would be delighted to assist you in finding restaurants based on your preferences for area, price range, or cuisine type. How may I be of service today?
formal_templates.ask_area: Could you please specify which area you would prefer?
formal_templates.ask_food: What type of cuisine would you like to enjoy?
formal_templates.ask_pricerange: What price range would be suitable for you?
formal_templates.ask_foodquality: What food quality would you prefer?
formal_templates.ask_crowdedness: What crowdedness level would you prefer?
formal_templates.ask_lengthstay: How long do you plan to stay?
formal_templates.confirm_correction: I apologize, but I did not recognize '{given}'. Did you perhaps mean '{corrected}'?
formal_templates.no_match_error: I was unable to locate a match for '{value}'. Would you be so kind as to rephrase your request?
formal_templates.additional_req: Do you have any additional requirements or preferences?
formal_templates.suggest: Based on your specified preferences, I have located {count} restaurants that match your criteria. Please allow me to present some options for your consideration: {restaurants}
formal_templates.goodbye: Thank you very much for using our service. Have a wonderful day!
formal_templates.no_alts: I regret to inform you that I could not find any restaurants that match your current preferences. Would you be willing to modify your criteria?
formal_templates.ask_change_slot: Unfortunately, no restaurants match your current preferences. Which criterion would you like to modify: area, cuisine type, or price range?
formal_templates.confirm_change: Very well—I shall update your {slot} preference. What {slot} would you prefer?
formal_templates.reset_confirm: Understood. I shall restart the search process from the beginning.
formal_templates.no_reset: I apologize, but system restarts are not currently permitted. Would you prefer to modify one of the following: area, cuisine type, or price range?
formal_templates.contact_info: Here is the contact information for {restaurant}: Telephone: {phone}, Address: {address}
